msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kolleseis in the left and right margins. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Unusually wide left margin (7.2 cm.) and narrow right margin ( 1.2 cm.). (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: "(Column) 27:;Phamenoth 7;Komon, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Germanos, slave of Longinus Isidoros, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpagethes, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Petsiris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Vettis, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Kastor the younger, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 16;;Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkaetis, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakiaris , drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Esouris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 76;;(Phamenoth) 8 likewise:;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris, drachmas 8;;Herieus the younger, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Zenas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;Sokrates, son of Heron, grandson of Heron, mother Protarous, drachmas 28;;in total for the day drachmas 60;;(Phamenoth) 9:;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, drachmas 8;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Petsoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaseis, drachmas 8;;Anchophis, son of Horos, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;for the 12th year, Ptolemaios, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Aunchis, copper drachmas 8;;likewise Petheus, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkateis, copper drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 56, obols 28, of which for the 12th year drachmas 16;;(Phamenoth) 10 likewise:;Heras alias Aphrodisios, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Apollonarion, drachmas 8;;Nemesas, slave of Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;for the 12th year Heras, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 28;;Dioskoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 60, of which for the 12th year drachmas 28;;(Phamenoth) 11 likewise:;Sabeinos, son of Sisois, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapais, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Thernouthis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 20."
